channel.title: General Hiromi Travel Awesome Japan on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Hiromi Travel Awesome Japan on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i made it to tokyo
item.description: The flight was long. I mean… LONG. I was sleepy so i slept all the way. but i still got bored on the plane. I really needed to bring a book - but it was dark and i didn’t want to wake up my neighbors. but i made it. Immigtation was sooo easy. They just said ok. I just got to hiromi’s house. It is really tiny. two rooms - stacked.
